Jx.TreeFolder

A Jx.TreeFolder is an item in a tree that can contain other items.  It is expandable and collapsible.

Example

Extends
Jx.TreeItem
License
Copyright © 2008, DM Solutions Group Inc.
This file is licensed under an MIT style license
Summary
Jx.TreeFolderA Jx.TreeFolder is an item in a tree that can contain other items. 
Options
openis the folder open?  
Functions
renderCreate a new instance of Jx.TreeFolder
addadd one or more items to the folder at a particular position in the folder
removeremove an item from the folder
replacereplaces one item with another
itemsreturn an array of tree item instances contained in this tree. 
emptyrecursively empty this folder and any folders in it
toggletoggle the state of the folder between open and closed
expandExpands the folder
collapseCollapses the folder
findChildGet a reference to a child node by recursively searching the tree



Options



open
is the folder open?   false by default.



Functions



render
render : function()
Create a new instance of Jx.TreeFolder



add
add: function(item,
position)
add one or more items to the folder at a particular position in the folder
Parameters
item{Jx.TreeItem} or an array of items to be added
position{mixed} optional location to add the items.   By default, this is ‘bottom’ meaning the items are added at the end of the list.  See Jx.List::add for options
Returns
{Jx.TreeFolder} a reference to this object for chaining calls



remove
remove: function(item)
remove an item from the folder
Parameters
item{Jx.TreeItem} the folder item to remove
Returns
{Jx.Tree} a reference to this object for chaining calls



replace
replace: function(item,
withItem)
replaces one item with another
Parameters
item{Jx.TreeItem} the tree item to remove
withItem{Jx.TreeItem} the tree item to insert
Returns
{Jx.Tree} a reference to this object for chaining calls



items
items: function()
return an array of tree item instances contained in this tree.  Does not descend into folders but does return a reference to the folders



empty
empty: function()
recursively empty this folder and any folders in it



toggle
toggle: function()
toggle the state of the folder between open and closed
Returns
{Jx.TreeFolder} a reference to this for chaining



expand
expand : function()
Expands the folder
Returns
{Jx.TreeFolder} a reference to this for chaining



collapse
collapse : function()
Collapses the folder
Returns
{Jx.TreeFolder} a reference to this for chaining



findChild
findChild : function(path)
Get a reference to a child node by recursively searching the tree
Parameters
path{Array} an array of labels of nodes to search for
Returns
{Object} the node or null if the path was not found









render : function()
Create a new instance of Jx.TreeFolder

position)
add one or more items to the folder at a particular position in the folder
remove: function(item)
remove an item from the folder
replace: function(item,
withItem)
replaces one item with another

return an array of tree item instances contained in this tree. 
empty: function()
recursively empty this folder and any folders in it
toggle: function()
toggle the state of the folder between open and closed
expand : function()
Expands the folder
collapse : function()
Collapses the folder
findChild : function(path)
Get a reference to a child node by recursively searching the tree
Extends: Jx.Widget
add: function(item,
position)
add an item to the list of items at the specified position
A Jx.TreeFolder is an item in a tree that can contain other items. 
Jx.Tree displays hierarchical data in a tree structure of folders and nodes.
